recipeInstructions.text: Line a pan (8x8 or 9x9) with parchment paper
Combine all of the ingredients in a medium saucepan over low heat.
Stir constantly until the mixture is completely melted - do not boil.
Remove it from the heat, pour it into the prepared pan, and spread evenly.
Cover and refrigerate for at least 2 hours or until the fudge is completely set.
